title: Is twitch worth learning as opposed to someone like vayne
body:
Is twitch even worth using nowadays? Its always the point of my team doesn't peel, they chase kills, and then boom I'm dead, or his poison never gets those 10 hp enemies who just manage to get away, or I stealth but the enemy team manages to get a hit on me before I go fully into stealth, and I don't outdamage other adc's in 1v1's. The only way I can get fed is if my supp is half decent and actually pokes/peels, but all you can expect from supps in my elo is people who don't speak english, grills, and people who leach exp and sit in the bush for the whole of laning.

Anyway, I steered off track. Whats the point of twitch over vayne in a self peeling, independent environment? Or as an adc in whole?
